features: What You Will Receive: you will receive 96 sheets of stationery papers and 48 pieces of vintage envelopes; Enough quantity can meet your different needs and replacements; You can use them to make party invitations, greeting cards or handwritten letters, menus, crafts and letters to Santa

Delicate Design: vintage paper and envelopes are in delicate and simple design that fits for most people's aesthetics, which adding a touch of elegance to your letters and correspondence with this lovely stationery set featuring natural colored pages and black borders

Reliable and Trustworthy Material: cute stationary set adopts reliable and quality paper material, which is sturdy and not easy to deform or fade; They are suitable for comfortable writing and can provide you with a long time application
Portable Size: postcard envelopes are approx. 4.33 x 8.66 inches/ 11 x 22 cm; Writing papers are approx. 11.02 x 8.46 inches/ 28 x 21.5 cm; Portable and suitable size for your daily applications

Wide Range of Applications: letter paper and envelopes set is suitable for writing inspirational quotes, letters, office meeting minutes, holiday drawings, birthday wishes, calligraphy, thank you notes, etc
body.description: Features: Nice gift choice: Stationery paper and envelopes set can be nice and thoughtful gifts for friends, students, teachers, coworkers and so on. The recipients will be delighted when they are receiving these gifts. Charming decorations: Vintage envelope and stationery can be attractive and charming decorations for various settings, such as homes, offices, schools, parties, baby showers, festivals and so on. Specifications: Material: paperColor: beigeSize: Writing paper: approx. 11.02 x 8.46 inches/ 28 x 21.5 cmEnvelope: approx. 4.33 x 8.66 inches/ 11 x 22 cmPackage includes: 96 Sheets of writing papers48 x EnvelopesNotes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thinner than I thought
reviews.reviewText: Not much like this for the price so worked out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin Paper / Envelopes Require Tape
reviews.reviewText: Much thinner/cheaper paper than I thought I was getting for this price. It’s as thin as computer printing paper. I was assuming this was heavier stationary fit for letter writing. Also, the envelopes don’t have any adhesive and you can’t even lick them shut. They require tape.If you’re just looking for fancy printing paper this will work great. If you’re after nicer paper for letters etc then I would look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 100% agreed with Canyon Hiker's review. Where's the adhesive on the envelopes?!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The envelopes do not have adhesive, you cant moisten them to stick. They have to be tapped shut.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I will not order this again. I will also avoid the company in the future. Envelopes had no adhesive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Envelopes are awful,
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn’t buy these again, the stuff is made from China and the envelopes don’t seal you have to use tape.
